title: Pacha nightclub logo
content:
I am currently working on a project for Pacha Nightclub. I need to know what the font they use is called, and if possible where I can get it from. Any help will be greatly recieved. Simply 'Google' "Pacha logo" to see the font, or have a look at the attachment.

Cheers guys,

Rich

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pacha logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100931/http:/typophile.com/files/pacha%20logo.jpg) | 30.8 KB |
author: Listen04

comments.content: This is most probably a custom designed logo. Maybe there are freeware fonts similar to this. I already did a quick check of the [Fontalicious](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100931/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Fontalicious) collection, but couldn't find it there.
If all you need is the logo -- [here it is](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100931/http:/brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=1857396&page=1&mtype=&brand_id=90878)

Yer cheers for this mate, already got the logo. I basically want to mock up a press ad and need to write a strapline in the font. I'll keep lookin'.

Thanks again.

I'm also interested in getting this font, if someone has any idea's or new information on this can you contact me through the 'contact page' on my website? Thanks, Steve.  
\>  
 [http://www.pawprintz.co.nz/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100931/http:/www.pawprintz.co.nz/ "http://www.pawprintz.co.nz/")
Don't hold your breath. As I said, this probably is a custom designed logo, so chances are pretty slim that there's a font out there looking like this.
